meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I worked on my homework until it was finished.
meanings.sent2: She worked at the store for many years before retiring.
meanings.sent3: The little robot worked tirelessly to clean up the mess.
meanings.sent4: His plan worked like a charm, and everything fell into place.
meanings.sent5: The idea of teamwork really clicked when we all worked together on the project.

meanings.sent1: The old car worked perfectly after the mechanic fixed it.
meanings.sent2: The clock worked all night, ticking away the hours.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand worked its spell, turning the frog into a prince.
meanings.sent4: The plan worked smoothly, and the event went off without a hitch.
meanings.sent5: The computer worked tirelessly to process all the data in record time.

meanings.sent1: She worked hard to achieve her dream of becoming a doctor.
meanings.sent2: He worked diligently on his painting, adding intricate details.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel worked frantically to gather nuts before winter.
meanings.sent4: The team worked together seamlessly to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent5: The athlete worked tirelessly to improve his performance and win the race.

meanings.definition: shaped or formed by hammering or other means
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith created a beautifully worked iron gate for the garden.
meanings.sent2: The intricate design on the jewelry showcased the finely worked details.
meanings.sent3: The artist displayed a series of finely worked sculptures at the gallery.
meanings.sent4: The carefully worked wood carving was a masterpiece of craftsmanship.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler admired the finely worked silver bracelet for its intricate patterns.
